about.title: About **Me**
about.subtitle: Get to know me through *code*
about.storyParagraph1: I'm a **developer** with over *20 years* of professional experience, but the story started much earlier — I was around 8 or 9 when I wrote my first lines of code. I focus on **web development**, with a strong love for **frontend** — where code meets design and user experience. I can handle backend too, but I feel at home making interfaces that connect with people.
about.storyParagraph2: I also have a background in **graphic design**, which sharpened my visual sense and communication skills. I'm **self‑taught** and *endlessly curious*, the kind of person who learns by exploring, breaking things, and fixing them better. I genuinely love *technology* — I can spend hours coding, experimenting, and building new ideas.
about.storyParagraph3: Born in **1980**, I've witnessed the evolution of computing from the pre‑PC days to today's *AI‑driven* world. Off‑screen, I'm happily in a relationship and a father of two amazing young adults.
about.storySummary: In short: a lifelong learner who codes with **purpose**, designs with *intent*, and never stops being **curious**.

skills.description: Here's a look at my skill set. The **tech world** changes every moment and that's what makes it *exciting*! I constantly keep my knowledge up to date and love exploring **new technologies** to keep growing.

descriptions.graphicDesignDescription: Design pieces for social media (banners, flyers, posts, stories)
descriptions.brandingDescription: Basic brand identity design (simple logos, color palettes, typography)
descriptions.imageEditingDescription: Basic image editing (color correction, cropping, simple montage)
descriptions.webPerformanceDescription: Basic page performance and optimization (images, lazy loading, etc.)
descriptions.webAccessibilityDescription: Basic web accessibility (good contrast, semantic structure, labels, etc.)
descriptions.styleGuidesDescription: Basic brand style guides (logo usage, colors, typography)
descriptions.integrationsDescription: Integration of external tools (forms, chats, simple CRMs, newsletters)
descriptions.automationDescription: Automations with Make / Zapier (e.g.: form → email → spreadsheet)
descriptions.apisWebhooksDescription: Integration between web and third-party tools (Notion, Sheets, etc.)
